entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Rock Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 a.m. PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of thunderstorms. Snow level 1000 metres. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
